name: Jimmy
description:
Jimmy is a fast paced colourful top-down shooter.

Description:

In Jimmy you play as a red pill. Each enemy spawn location is procedurally generated, if you stand still to long the enemies start spawning at your current position.

There are five stages each one featuring there own weapon:

-Stage one - pistol

-Stage two - burst rifle

-Stage three - automatic rifle

-Stage four - shotgun

-Stage five - automatic shotgun

This game couldn't be made without Sebastian Lague's tutorials check out his channel here:

https://www.youtube.com/user/Cercopithecan/featured

Thanks for playing and have a wonderful time

Kind Regards

AramB

Controls:

Left Mouse click to shoot.

WASD or the arrow-keys to move.
